data.headline: Nvidia rallies on news of a multi-year GPU deal with Meta, boosting chip and software stocks.
bullets: Analog Devices jumps after an earnings beat, while Cadence and Synopsys rise on strong outlooks and Nvidia stake exposure.
Palantir, Wingstop, Apple, Garmin, and Moderna also advance in early trading.
Palo Alto Networks and Genuine Parts lag the broader market.
S&P 500 (+0.24%), Dow (+0.15%), Nasdaq (+0.12%), and Russell 2000 (+0.03%) track premarket gains.
Durable goods orders beat expectations (–1.4% vs –2.3% forecast), with core orders up 0.6% despite Boeing weakness.
Treasury yields remain near multiweek lows around 4.1%, supporting risk sentiment.
Traders await FOMC minutes for rate-cut signals amid sticky but softening global inflation and a quiet macro calendar.
